channel.title: ~rep if i could~ error problem
channel.description:
Any ideas on how to fix this? I followed this tutorial and got the error: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,442138.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,442138.0.html[/url]
It is dealing with this code: [code]public static int obelisktimer[] = new int[5];[/tt][/code]
THIS IS ERROR [code]PlayerHandler.java:33: illegal start of type public static int obelisktimer[] = new int[5];[/tt] ^ PlayerHandler.java:33: ';' expected public static int obelisktimer[] = new int[5];[/tt] ^ PlayerHandler.java:33: <identifier> expected public static int obelisktimer[] = new int[5];[/tt] ^ 3 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .[/code] [code] Remove that [/tt][/code]
ERROR IS NOW: [code]client.java:13056: cannot find symbol symbol : method obelisk(int,int,int) location: class client obelisk(3305, 3914, 14825); ^ client.java:13062: cannot find symbol symbol : method obelisk(int,int,int) location: class client obelisk(3225, 3665, 14825); ^ client.java:13068: cannot find symbol symbol : method obelisk(int,int,int) location: class client obelisk(3154, 3618, 14825); ^ client.java:13074: cannot find symbol symbol : method obelisk(int,int,int) location: class client obelisk(3104, 3792, 14825); ^ client.java:13080: cannot find symbol symbol : method obelisk(int,int,int) location: class client obelisk(2978, 3864, 14825); ^ PlayerHandler.java:209: operator < cannot be applied to int[],int if(obelisktimer < 1) continue; ^ PlayerHandler.java:210: operator -- cannot be applied to int[] obelisktimer--; ^ PlayerHandler.java:212: incomparable types: int[] and int if(obelisktimer == 0) { ^ PlayerHandler.java:222: inconvertible types found : Player[] required: client client c = (client)players; ^ PlayerHandler.java:225: operator - cannot be applied to int[],int c.obelisk(X-2, Y-2, ID); ^ PlayerHandler.java:225: operator - cannot be applied to int[],int c.obelisk(X-2, Y-2, ID); ^ PlayerHandler.java:227: GoodDistance(int,int,int,int,int) in client cannot be ap plied to (int[],int[],int,int,int) if(c.GoodDistance(X, Y, c.absX, c.absY, 1)) { ^ PlayerHandler.java:238: cannot find symbol symbol : method triggerTeleother(int,int,int) location: class client c.triggerTeleother(X[number]-1+misc.random(2), Y[number]-1+misc.rand om(2), 0); ^ 13 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
DECLARED THIS: [code]obelisk(int, int, int)[/code]
ERROR:
[code]client.java:50: '.class' expected Obelisk(int, int, int) ^ client.java:50: '.class' expected Obelisk(int, int, int) ^ client.java:50: '.class' expected Obelisk(int, int, int) ^ client.java:50: ';' expected Obelisk(int, int, int) ^ 4 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

public void obelisk(int a, int b, int c) { }

item.title: ~rep if i could~ error problem
item.dc:creator: @p00n99range p00n99range
item.description:
@p00n99range wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=Dastan_ link=topic=443458.msg3256432#msg3256432 date=1278141113]
instead of this : obelisk(3154, 3618, 14825); DO :

obelisk(int, int, int)

was that so hard ?
[/quote]
You, are absolutely retarded…
obelisk(3154, 3618, 14825);
^int ^int ^int

He just has to declare this: [quote]obelisk(int, int, int)[/quote][/quote]

Now i got this error:
From The Code:

Obelisk(int, int, int)

client.java:50: '.class' expected Obelisk(int, int, int) ^ client.java:50: '.class' expected Obelisk(int, int, int) ^ client.java:50: '.class' expected Obelisk(int, int, int) ^ client.java:50: ';' expected Obelisk(int, int, int) ^ 4 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

item.description:
@p00n99range wrote:

adu:

Remove that [/tt]

Then this happens:

client.java:13056: cannot find symbol symbol : method obelisk(int,int,int) location: class client obelisk(3305, 3914, 14825); ^ client.java:13062: cannot find symbol symbol : method obelisk(int,int,int) location: class client obelisk(3225, 3665, 14825); ^ client.java:13068: cannot find symbol symbol : method obelisk(int,int,int) location: class client obelisk(3154, 3618, 14825); ^ client.java:13074: cannot find symbol symbol : method obelisk(int,int,int) location: class client obelisk(3104, 3792, 14825); ^ client.java:13080: cannot find symbol symbol : method obelisk(int,int,int) location: class client obelisk(2978, 3864, 14825); ^ PlayerHandler.java:209: operator < cannot be applied to int[],int if(obelisktimer < 1) continue; ^ PlayerHandler.java:210: operator -- cannot be applied to int[] obelisktimer--; ^ PlayerHandler.java:212: incomparable types: int[] and int if(obelisktimer == 0) { ^ PlayerHandler.java:222: inconvertible types found : Player[] required: client client c = (client)players; ^ PlayerHandler.java:225: operator - cannot be applied to int[],int c.obelisk(X-2, Y-2, ID); ^ PlayerHandler.java:225: operator - cannot be applied to int[],int c.obelisk(X-2, Y-2, ID); ^ PlayerHandler.java:227: GoodDistance(int,int,int,int,int) in client cannot be ap plied to (int[],int[],int,int,int) if(c.GoodDistance(X, Y, c.absX, c.absY, 1)) { ^ PlayerHandler.java:238: cannot find symbol symbol : method triggerTeleother(int,int,int) location: class client c.triggerTeleother(X[number]-1+misc.random(2), Y[number]-1+misc.rand om(2), 0); ^ 13 errors Finished! item.title: ~rep if i could~ error problem
item.dc:creator: @p00n99range p00n99range
item.description:
@p00n99range wrote:

Any ideas on how to fix this? I followed this tutorial and got the error: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,442138.0.html

It is dealing with this code:

public static int obelisktimer[] = new int[5];[/tt]

THIS IS ERROR

PlayerHandler.java:33: illegal start of type public static int obelisktimer[] = new int[5];[/tt] ^ PlayerHandler.java:33: ';' expected public static int obelisktimer[] = new int[5];[/tt] ^ PlayerHandler.java:33: <identifier> expected public static int obelisktimer[] = new int[5];[/tt] ^ 3 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

Remove that [/tt]

ERROR IS NOW:

client.java:13056: cannot find symbol symbol : method obelisk(int,int,int) location: class client obelisk(3305, 3914, 14825); ^ client.java:13062: cannot find symbol symbol : method obelisk(int,int,int) location: class client obelisk(3225, 3665, 14825); ^ client.java:13068: cannot find symbol symbol : method obelisk(int,int,int) location: class client obelisk(3154, 3618, 14825); ^ client.java:13074: cannot find symbol symbol : method obelisk(int,int,int) location: class client obelisk(3104, 3792, 14825); ^ client.java:13080: cannot find symbol symbol : method obelisk(int,int,int) location: class client obelisk(2978, 3864, 14825); ^ PlayerHandler.java:209: operator < cannot be applied to int[],int if(obelisktimer < 1) continue; ^ PlayerHandler.java:210: operator -- cannot be applied to int[] obelisktimer--; ^ PlayerHandler.java:212: incomparable types: int[] and int if(obelisktimer == 0) { ^ PlayerHandler.java:222: inconvertible types found : Player[] required: client client c = (client)players; ^ PlayerHandler.java:225: operator - cannot be applied to int[],int c.obelisk(X-2, Y-2, ID); ^ PlayerHandler.java:225: operator - cannot be applied to int[],int c.obelisk(X-2, Y-2, ID); ^ PlayerHandler.java:227: GoodDistance(int,int,int,int,int) in client cannot be ap plied to (int[],int[],int,int,int) if(c.GoodDistance(X, Y, c.absX, c.absY, 1)) { ^ PlayerHandler.java:238: cannot find symbol symbol : method triggerTeleother(int,int,int) location: class client c.triggerTeleother(X[number]-1+misc.random(2), Y[number]-1+misc.rand om(2), 0); ^ 13 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

obelisk(int, int, int)
